trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_SEQ_00<tab>Stigma-4 requires materials for regularly scheduled environmental analysis.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Stigma-4.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> south of the wellspring of regret.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Stigma-4.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> south of the wellspring of regret.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Stigma-4.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> in the wellspring of regret.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Stigma-4.)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>
TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>In accordance with protocol introduced by the flea-infested manager, the Last Dregs' water supply is currently sourced directly from the wellspring of regret.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>As organic life-forms have a tendency to succumb to even minor environmental fluctuations, regular analysis and maintenance of the water supply is imperative to prevent widespread demise of café patrons.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>Appropriate sample for analysis detected. Approximate coordinates: 13, 16, 2. Harmful agents can seep into solid stone, indicating current levels of environmental toxicity. Speedy completion of task objectives is highly recommended.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_004<tab>Appropriate sample for analysis detected. Approximate coordinates: 13, 14, 2. Harmful agents often seep into the soil, indicating current levels of environmental toxicity. Speedy completion of task objectives is highly recommended.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_005<tab>Appropriate sample for analysis detected. Approximate coordinates: 14, 11, 2. Resident fauna can be analyzed for harmful agents, indicating current levels of toxicity. Gold salmon roe, available for purchase from N<var 1F /var>0598, is estimated to further expediency of completing task objectives.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_006<tab>Repeating task objectives: proceed to coordinates 13, 16, 2 and obtain requested sample. Every idle moment exacerbates potential corruption of the Last Dregs' water supply.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_007<tab>Repeating task objectives: proceed to coordinates 13, 14, 2 and obtain requested sample. Every idle moment exacerbates potential corruption of the Last Dregs' water supply.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_008<tab>Repeating task objectives: purchase gold salmon roe from N-0598, proceed to coordinates 14, 11, 2, and obtain requested fish. Every idle moment exacerbates potential corruption of the Last Dregs' water supply.
TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_009<tab>Return of allied courier <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> confirmed. Requesting detailed report with deliverables.
TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_010<tab>Analyzing delivered materials... In accordance with pan-galactic sanitation standards, the purity level of the water source has received a grade of B.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_011<tab>In contrast, Alphatron water can be instantly synthesized to exceed a grade of A by all accepted standards. The foul-smelling manager's insistence on “natural” water is conclusively illogical.

TEXT_BANOMI103_04609_STIGMA4_000_012<tab>However, so long as its provision does not hinder current work objectives, B-grade water meets minimum safety standards. Receive your recompense for this task and await future instructions, perhaps while imbibing some technically nontoxic liquids.
